reason.raw: Just received reports that Martians are not short enough to operate this equipment.
reason.html: Just received reports that Martians are not short enough to operate this equipment.

description.raw:
This is the rover where the solar panel from pull request #34 will be placed:

![rover2.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/2661561040-rover2.png)

* It's a static model which won't be moved

* The collision shapes which will be in contact with the solar panel and potentially the robot were carefully placed to match the visuals. The rest of the rover has a generic box collision. Let me know if you see any problem with this and I can work on more detailed collisions for the rest of the rover:

![rover3.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/1374181416-rover3.png)
